article_title: What Physicians And Patients Have To Say About "Change"

article_metadata.author: Walker Ray, MD and Tim Norbeck

og.description: What makes a physician leave private practice for employment? And what does that change mean to the physicians’ patients? Last month The Physicians Foundation conducted focus groups with patients and physicians in New York City to help us answer those questions.
